meta.description: Determine the minimum number of chain stores to be built in a new residential area such that the distance from any residential area to one of the chain stores does not exceed 800 meters.

sets.name: AREAS
sets.description: Areas in the new residential region.

params.name: coverage
params.description: Areas within 800 meters radius of each area.

vars.name: y
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if a store is built in a given area.

objective.name: min_total_stores
objective.description: Minimize the total number of chain stores to be built.

constraints.name: coverage_constraint_A
constraints.description: Ensure area A is covered by at least one store.

constraints.name: coverage_constraint_B
constraints.description: Ensure area B is covered by at least one store.

constraints.description: Ensure area C is covered by at least one store.

constraints.description: Ensure area L is covered by at least one store.
